title: SINGER 2131E All Purpose Machine Oil, 4-Fluid Ounces
description: Use SINGER All Purpose Machine Oil to keep your sewing machine running smoothly. The oil eliminates friction between touching metal parts and prevents damage caused by abrasion and rust. The specially formulated lubricant can be used on sewing/knitting machines, vacuum cleaners, household appliances, typewriters, computers, bicycle gears and other appliances. Comes in a 4-ounce bottle.
